color.description: Represents the current color of the light.

brightness.description: Denotes the intensity of the light emitted.

powerState.description: Indicates whether the light is turned on or off.

setColor.description: Sets the color of the light.

adjustBrightness.description: Adjusts the brightness level of the light.

turnOnOff.description: Turns the light on or off.

colorChanged.description: Triggered when the color of the light is changed.

brightnessChanged.description: Triggered when the brightness level of the light is adjusted.

powerStateChanged.description: Triggered when the power state of the light is changed.

mode.description: Denotes the operational mode of the thermostat (cooling, heating, etc.).

setpoint.description: Indicates the desired temperature set by the user.

setMode.description: Sets the operational mode of the thermostat.

temperatureChanged.description: Triggered when the temperature reading changes.

modeChanged.description: Triggered when the operational mode of the thermostat changes.

setpointChanged.description: Triggered when the desired temperature setpoint is adjusted.

powerState.description: Indicates whether the TV is turned on or off.

changeChannel.description: Changes the channel of the TV.

adjustVolume.description: Adjusts the volume level of the TV.

turnOnOff.description: Turns the TV on or off.

channelChanged.description: Triggered when the channel of the TV is changed.

volumeChanged.description: Triggered when the volume level of the TV is adjusted.

powerStateChanged.description: Triggered when the power state of the TV is changed.

position.description: Represents the current position of the blinds (open, closed, partially open, etc.).

orientation.description: Denotes the angle of the blinds slats (if applicable).

powerState.description: Indicates whether the blinds are in operation or not.

setPosition.description: Sets the position of the blinds.

adjustOrientation.description: Adjusts the orientation of the blinds slats.

positionChanged.description: Triggered when the position of the blinds changes.

orientationChanged.description: Triggered when the orientation of the blinds slats is adjusted.

powerStateChanged.description: Triggered when the power state of the blinds is changed.
